original_text:
Hot Hot Fruit
Il tema frutta è forse il più utilizzato in assoluto per le slot e questo molto spesso si traduce in giochi sempre uguali con minimi cambiamenti nella grafica o nella scelta dei simboli utilizzati. Hot Hot Fruit mantiene i simboli  classici delle slot fruttate ma offre un gameplay che si discosta da tutte le altre, grazie ai simboli a trasformazione che a ogni giro moltiplicano le vincite. Partiamo però dalla grafica, altro punto di forza di questa slot. La Habanero ci ha abituato a prodotti con una grafica spettacolare e non ha di certo perso questa abitudine quando ha sviluppato Hot Hot Fruit: i simboli  della frutta sono in 3D, sembrano reali al punto che vien quasi voglia di afferrali e di assaggiarli, le animazioni sono fluide e per nulla pacchiane, i colori vivaci. Sotto la griglia di gioco sono presenti tutte le impostazioni per settare al meglio la nostra scommessa. Si può scegliere un livello compreso tra 1 e 10 che ha la funzione di moltiplicatore per la puntata totale, c’è il tasto per impostare la puntata massima con un solo click e quello per far partire i giri automatici. Un riquadro sulla sinistra ci informa sul nostro saldo residuo.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Molte slot prodotte dalla Habanero hanno griglie più grandi della norma, in questo caso però si è scelto di puntare su una classica 5X3. Le linee di gioco sono 15 fisse e le scommesse vanno da 0,01 € fino a 20 € per linea. Ciò significa che puntando il minimo previsto, ogni Spin viene a costare 0,15 € e questo rende Hot Hot Fruit attraente anche per chi non ha intenzione di investire un capitale nel gioco. Questa slot ha un buon RTP del 96,84% e una volatilità media. È possibile impostare tra i 10 e i 500 giri automatici. La slot prevede inoltre un Jackpot a tempo, il cui valore viene riportato in alto sulla schermata di gioco.
Simboli e funzionalità
In Hot Hot Fruit sono presenti simboli con valore basso e alto: i primi sono rappresentati dai tre frutti, anguria, arancia e prugna, i secondi dalla scritta Bar e dal numero 7. A ogni giro e in modo del tutto casuale può attivarsi però la funzione Hot Hot: tutti i simboli si trasformano (la frutta apparirà tagliata a fette, la scritta Bar verrà raddoppiata così come quella Wild) e il loro valore raddoppierà. Il simbolo 7 invece verrà triplicato e il valore moltiplicato per 3.
Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato dalla scritta omonima, appare solo sui rulli 1, 2, 4 e 5 e non assegna vincite. Con 3 simboli Wild o doppio Wild che appaiono da sinistra a destra o da destra a sinistra sui rulli 1 e 2 o sui rulli 4 e 5, si avrà diritto a 6 giri gratuiti. Con 3 simboli Wild o doppio Wild che appaiono da sinistra a destra e da destra a sinistra sui rulli 1 e 2  e sui rulli 4 e 5, si avrà diritto a 12 giri gratuiti. Durante i Free Spins i simboli vincenti rimarranno sui rulli durante tutto il gioco bonus.

raw_translation.response:
Hot Hot Fruit
The fruit theme is perhaps the most used in slot games, and this often results in games that are always the same, with minimal changes in graphics or choice of symbols used. However, Hot Hot Fruit maintains classic fruit slot symbols while offering gameplay that stands out from all others, thanks to transformation symbols that multiply winnings with each spin. Let's start with the graphics, another strong point of this slot. Habanero has accustomed us to products with spectacular graphics and has certainly not lost this habit when developing Hot Hot Fruit: 3D fruit symbols look so real that you almost want to grab them and taste them, animations are smooth and not at all cheesy, and the colors are bright. Under the game grid, there are all the settings to best set our bet. You can choose a level between 1 and 10, which serves as a multiplier for the total bet, there is a button to set the maximum bet with a single click, and one to start automatic spins. A box on the left informs us of our remaining balance.

Main features of the slot
Many slots produced by Habanero have larger than normal grids, but in this case, they chose to focus on a classic 5X3. The paylines are 15 fixed and bets range from €0.01 up to €20 per line. This means that by betting the minimum, every spin costs €0.15, making Hot Hot Fruit attractive to those who do not intend to invest a fortune in the game. This slot has a good RTP of 96.84% and medium volatility. You can set between 10 and 500 automatic spins. The slot also features a timed jackpot, with its value displayed at the top of the game screen.

Symbols and features
Hot Hot Fruit has symbols with low and high values: the first are represented by three fruits, watermelon, orange, and plum, while the second consists of the word Bar and the number 7. However, during each spin, the Hot Hot function can randomly activate: all symbols will transform (fruit will appear sliced, Bar will be doubled and so will the Wild), and their value will double. The 7 symbol will instead be tripled and its value multiplied by 3.

The Wild symbol is represented by the word itself, which only appears on reels 1, 2, 4, and 5 and does not give payouts. With 3 Wild or Double Wild symbols appearing from left to right or right to left on reels 1 and 2 or reels 4 and 5, you will be entitled to 6 free spins. With 3 Wild or Double Wild symbols appearing from left to right and right to left on reels 1 and 2 and reels 4 and 5, you will be entitled to 12 free spins. During Free Spins, winning symbols will remain on the reels throughout the bonus game.

Hot Hot Fruit is a classic 5x3 slot game with 15 fixed paylines and bets ranging from €0.01 to €20 per line. The Hot Hot feature is a game-changer. All symbols transform and multiply winnings with each spin. The game also has a timed jackpot, and you can set between 10 and 500 automatic spins.

Graphics

Habanero has accustomed us to products with spectacular graphics, and Hot Hot Fruit is no exception. The fruit symbols are in 3D and look so real, you almost want to grab and taste them. The animations are smooth, the colors are vivid, and the design is impeccable.

Jackpot

Hot Hot Fruit has a timed jackpot, and its value is displayed at the top of the game screen. This feature adds an extra layer of excitement and anticipation to the game, giving players the chance to win a substantial prize while having fun spinning the reels.

Special Features

The Hot Hot feature is the game's main special feature. On every spin and randomly, all symbols transform, and their value doubles. The 7 symbol will be tripled, and its value will be multiplied by 3. Additionally, with 3 Wild or double Wild symbols that appear from left to right or right to left on reels 1 and 2 or on reels 4 and 5, you are entitled to 6 free spins. With 3 Wild or double Wild symbols that appear from left to right and right to left on reels 1 and 2 and on reels 4 and 5, you are entitled to 12 free spins. During Free Spins, winning symbols remain on the reels throughout the bonus game.

RTP/Volatility

Hot Hot Fruit has a good RTP of 96.84% and medium volatility. The minimum bet of €0.15 makes the game attractive even to those who do not intend to invest a lot of money in the game. The game allows players to set their level of risk and choose the number of automatic spins, adding flexibility to the gaming experience.

Review: Hot Hot Fruit
The fruit theme is perhaps the most commonly used in slot games and often results in games that are always the same with minimal changes in graphics or symbol choices. Hot Hot Fruit maintains the classic fruit symbols of slot games, but offers gameplay that sets it apart from all others with transformation symbols that multiply winnings with each spin. Let's start with the graphics, another strong point of this slot game. Habanero has accustomed us to products with spectacular graphics and has certainly not lost this habit when developing Hot Hot Fruit: the fruit symbols are in 3D, they look so real that you almost want to grab and taste them, the animations are smooth and not tacky, the colors are vivid. Below the game grid are all the settings to set our bet to the best. You can choose a level between 1 and 10 which serves as a multiplier for the total bet, there is a button to set the maximum bet with one click and one to start automatic spins. A box on the left informs us of our remaining balance.

Main features of the slot game
Many slots produced by Habanero have larger than normal game grids, but in this case, they chose to focus on a classic 5x3. There are 15 fixed paylines and bets range from €0.01 to €20 per line. This means that by betting the minimum, each spin costs €0.15, making Hot Hot Fruit attractive even to those who do not intend to invest a lot of money in the game. This slot has a good RTP of 96.84% and medium volatility. You can set between 10 and 500 automatic spins. The slot game also has a timed jackpot, the value of which is displayed at the top of the game screen.

Symbols and functionality
Hot Hot Fruit has low and high-value symbols: the former are represented by the three fruits, watermelon, orange, and plum, and the latter by the Bar sign and the number 7. However, on every spin and randomly, the Hot Hot feature can activate: all symbols transform (the fruit will appear sliced, the Bar sign will be doubled as well as the Wild symbol) and their value will double. The 7 symbol, on the other hand, will be tripled, and its value will be multiplied by 3.

The Wild symbol is represented by the word "Wild", appears only on reels 1, 2, 4, and 5, and does not award winnings. With 3 Wild or double Wild symbols that appear from left to right or right to left on reels 1 and 2 or on reels 4 and 5, you are entitled to 6 free spins. With 3 Wild or double Wild symbols that appear from left to right and right to left on reels 1 and 2 and on reels 4 and 5, you are entitled to 12 free spins. During Free Spins, winning symbols remain on the reels throughout the bonus game.
